title: The Lover Beneath Me
description: edited by Hot Tree Edting This is the third and final installment of the Devil Trilogy Addie is lost as she tries to move forward with her life, but when unexpected events occur taking her to Europe, Addie is finally able to experience the life she had always dreamed of. However without Daimon by her side, Addie is unable to fill the void that he left in her heart.Will Addie be able to find the strength to reenter Daimon's lifeor has their twisted and dark romance finally met its end?Note from the Author: This is a dysfunctional love and hate trilogy that involves emotional blackmail and a few other situations that the one wouldn't do to the person they liked or loved. Addie and Daimon do what they do under the guise of a love that hurts so good. Happy Reading. Part of the proceeds of this book will go to http://www.ccfa.org http://www.crohnsandcolitis.ca (less)
author: Evangelene
